fullText: Under the direction of Lila Neugebauer, this Broadway revival of Branden Jacobs-Jenkins' 'Appropriate' is a masterclass in tension and family dysfunction that feels both timeless and urgently contemporary.
dtliExcerpt: Under the direction of Lila Neugebauer, this Broadway revival of Branden Jacobs-Jenkins' 'Appropriate' is a masterclass in tension and family dysfunction that feels both timeless and urgently contemporary.
